test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X red) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X yellow) (sort Y airconditioner))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X red) (sort Y airconditioner))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X television))) )
test.nl: The door of the closet is closed. The door of the cupboard is opened. Put the red remotecontrol in the microwave. Put a can which is yellow on the airconditioner. Put a bottle which is red on the airconditioner. Open the closet. Close the cupboard. Go to the television.
